title: Palestinian journalists recognized: UNESCO awards prize to those covering Gaza war | Flipboard
text: Palestinian journalists recognized: UNESCO awards prize to those covering Gaza war Journalists and media workers have gathered in Chile's capital for the UNESCO World Press Freedom Day Conference. More stories from [Al Jazeera](/@AlJazeera) Join the flipboard community Discover, collect, and share stories for all your interests [Sign up](/signup) More stories from [Gaza](/topic/gaza) [Israeli hostage, 18, says Hamas captor wanted to marry, have children with her: ‘He gave me a ring on day 14’](/topic/gaza/israeli-hostage-18-says-hamas-captor-wanted-to-marry-have-children-with-her-/f-3a2ee66da5%2Fnypost.com) An Israeli woman who was held captive by Hamas for nearly two months following the Oct. 7 attack revealed that her captor gave her a ring and told … [Israel rejects ceasefire due to concerns Hamas would release hostages](/topic/gaza/israel-rejects-ceasefire-due-to-concerns-hamas-would-release-hostages/a-C8d7OJsES5Cpxvsnvqjv_g%3Aa%3A179087245-6852a5ba0e%2Fco.uk) Israel is understood to be rejecting a permanent ceasefire deal due to concerns that Hamas would release all of the hostages.
